articles.author: Andrea Margolis, David Spunt, Jake Gibson
articles.title: DOJ warns Elon Musk's America PAC that $1 million giveaway may break the law - Fox News
articles.description: A group of lawyers who served in Republican administrations contacted the DOJ about the legality of America PAC's $1 million giveaway, prompting the agency to write to Musk's PAC.
articles.content: The Department of Justice (DOJ) recently contacted Elon Musk's America PAC about its historic $1 million giveaway to swing-state voters after the agency was warned by lawyers who claimed that the ini… [+3048 chars]

articles.author: Adrianna Rodriguez
articles.title: New guidance for stroke prevention includes Ozempic, other weight loss drugs - USA TODAY
articles.description: For the first time in a decade, the American Heart Association and American Stroke Association issued new recommendations for preventing strokes.
articles.content:
Experts this week identified new risks and issued updated recommendations for preventing strokes, a leading cause of death and disability in the U.S.

articles.author: Curt Merrill, Matt Stiles, Ethan Cohen
articles.title: 4 charts show how early voting is going in the US - CNN
articles.description: Millions of Americans have already cast their ballots in the November election, either by mail or through early in-person voting, getting a head start on shaping the presidential race.
articles.content: CNN is monitoring who is casting pre-election ballots in the 36 states that offer early voting, as well as how early voting numbers compare with four years ago, when pre-election voting reached histo… [+1603 chars]
